title: Visual studio.net 2003 image screen saver example
content:
does anybody know where i can find a visual studio.net 2003 image screensaver example, complete with image & coding?[quote]Quote:[hr]Woe to you Oh Earth and Sea
for the Devil sends the beast with wrath
because he knows the time is short
Let him who hath understanding
reckon the number of the beast
for it is a human number
its number is six hundred and sixty six.[hr][/quote]

title: Re: Visual studio.net 2003 image screen saver example
content: This took me all of five seconds on Google: [url=http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=f0288df5-01d8-4246-b755-5237e08b0016&displaylang=en]www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=f0288df5-01d8-4246-b755-5237e08b0016&displaylang=en[/url]. It's written in VB.NET, but if you have the whole studio then VB is the best place to start.
